data.name: Terma Lux
data.detailed_description:
Browse the complete range of Terma radiators, heating elements and accessories. Have a look at inspiring arrangement ideas. Find the radiator ideally matching your needs! Watch it in 3D and VR! When you find interesting product you can buy it worldwide.

Terma Lux is a state-of-the-art application giving you instant access to the complete range of Terma products from any location at any time. It features more than 100 radiators, complete range of heating elements and accessories required for the installation or enhancing the radiator’s functionality. The application shows a broad palette of colours, which allows the user to adapt the radiator to the character of every room. You can chose from almost 250 RAL and Terma special colours.

You can browse our offer, select particular models and see the details. Watch each product in 3D and VR and see real-time 3D animations for some of them. You can also see instructional videos and new products presentations.

All product-related functions of the Terma Lux application are also available without a VR headset. However, 3D image is much more realistic and palpable. That is why we recommend a walk in a VR headset. While using a VR headset you gain an option of looking around and moving closer to objects by means of head movements.

We hope that our Terma Lux application will inspire you to create the interior of your dreams. We encourage you to browse through our collection of arrangement ideas. You can be sure that the product we suggest is an ideal match for the particular interior. Terma designers and graphic artists ensure that both the radiators and the arrangement ideas are in line with the latest design trends.

Once you find your ideal model and determine the colour, you need to define technical parameters. Our application includes information on available sizes, connection types and heating parameters.

We believe that our application will meet your needs and you will enjoy using it while designing your living space. The application is available for desktop computers and touch screen Windows-based machines. You can also download a mobile version of this application for your smartphones and tablets.

data.short_description: Browse the complete range of Terma radiators, heating elements and accessories. Have a look at inspiring arrangement ideas. Find the radiator ideally matching your needs! Watch it in 3D and VR! When you find interesting product you can buy it worldwide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX12 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
